openstack%2Fpuppet-nova~378145,openstack/puppet-nova,master,I60f9389a571362191180442ffbad9a92bd9c0c78,Fix load paths for nova base provider,MERGED,2016-09-28 02:00:49.000000000,2016-09-28 22:41:32.000000000,4,0,[{'_account_id': 3, 'name': 'Jenkins', 'username': 'jenkins'}, {'_account_id': 3153, 'name': 'Emilien Macchi', 'email': 'emilien@redhat.com', 'username': 'emilienm'}, {'_account_id': 7745, 'name': 'Denis Egorenko', 'email': 'degorenko@mirantis.com', 'username': 'degorenko'}, {'_account_id': 8971, 'name': 'Fuel CI', 'username': 'fuel-ci', 'inactive': True, 'tags': ['SERVICE_USER']}, {'_account_id': 9500, 'name': 'Matt Fischer', 'email': 'matt@mattfischer.com', 'username': 'mfisch'}, {'_account_id': 14985, 'name': 'Alex Schultz', 'email': 'aschultz@next-development.com', 'username': 'mwhahaha'}]",,0,"[{'number': 5, 'created': '2016-09-28 14:41:38.000000000', 'files': ['lib/puppet/provider/nova.rb'], 'message': ""Fix load paths for nova base provider

This adds the $LOAD_PATH manipulation needed to find openstacklib from
the nova base provider code.  When compiling a static catalog (puppet
master --compile), the puppet master doesn't populate the plugin
directory before hand.  That means that either openstacklib won't be
found at all, or may be an old mismatched version.  This code is copied
from the keystone module which has similar needs.

Change-Id: I60f9389a571362191180442ffbad9a92bd9c0c78
""}]",378145,c1b27658eae65b11d66a45fce0432d12b23bed2c,10540,Clayton O'Neill,coneill,0,"Fix load paths for nova base provider
This adds the $LOAD_PATH manipulation needed to find openstacklib from
the nova base provider code.  When compiling a static catalog (puppet
master --compile), the puppet master doesn't populate the plugin
directory before hand.  That means that either openstacklib won't be
found at all, or may be an old mismatched version.  This code is copied
from the keystone module which has similar needs.

,['lib/puppet/provider/nova.rb']

[obj for obj in data if test(obj)].

openstack%2Ftempest~370542,openstack/tempest,master,If210bd1322df96c0c8aea1f257148dc46affb422,Use ConfigParser instead of SafeConfigParser,MERGED,2016-09-15 05:10:48.000000000,2016-09-28 22:10:06.000000000,2,2,[{'_account_id': 3, 'name': 'Jenkins', 'username': 'jenkins'}, {'_account_id': 5196, 'name': 'Matthew Treinish', 'email': 'mtreinish@kortar.org', 'username': 'treinish'}, {'_account_id': 6167, 'name': ""Ken'ichi Ohmichi"", 'email': 'ken1ohmichi@gmail.com', 'username': 'oomichi'}, {'_account_id': 7350, 'name': 'Jordan Pittier', 'email': 'jordan.pittier@gmail.com', 'username': 'JordanP'}, {'_account_id': 8556, 'name': 'Ghanshyam', 'display_name': 'Ghanshyam Maan', 'email': 'gmaan@ghanshyammann.com', 'username': 'ghanshyam'}, {'_account_id': 17776, 'name': 'Reedip', 'email': 'reedip.banerjee@gmail.com', 'username': 'Reedip'}]","[{'rev_nbr': 1, 'author': '2016-09-15 06:29:36.000000000', 'date': '2016-09-15 06:29:36.000000000'}]",0,"[{'number': 1, 'created': '2016-09-15 05:10:48.000000000', 'files': ['tempest/cmd/verify_tempest_config.py', 'tempest/cmd/init.py'], 'message': 'Use ConfigParser instead of SafeConfigParser

SafeConfigParser supports interpolation on top of ConfigParser in Python 2,
and SafeConfigParser is deprecated in Python 3.2 and log warning
like "" DeprecationWarning: The SafeConfigParser class has been renamed to
ConfigParser in Python 3.2. This alias will be removed in future versions.
Use ConfigParser directly instead.""
So we can use ConfigParser if we don't need interpolation.

Change-Id: If210bd1322df96c0c8aea1f257148dc46affb422
Closes-Bug: #1618666
'}]",370542,8254a3f54d757927d159b3edc4f4f982bd8d6138,14867,Jaivish Kothari(janonymous),Janonymous,0,"Use ConfigParser instead of SafeConfigParser
SafeConfigParser supports interpolation on top of ConfigParser in Python 2,
and SafeConfigParser is deprecated in Python 3.2 and log warning
like "" DeprecationWarning: The SafeConfigParser class has been renamed to
ConfigParser in Python 3.2. This alias will be removed in future versions.
So we can use ConfigParser if we don't need interpolation.

'files': ['cinder/objects/base.py'], 'message': ""Have a default OPTIONAL_FIELDS for persistent OVOs

Conditional update method from the persistent OVO class is blindly
relying on persistent OVOs having an OPTIONAl_FIELDS attribute without
defining a default.

This patch adds an empty default so we can do conditional updates on
persistent OVO instances that don't have optional fields.

Change-Id: Icf640da34df0990b5ad2609d5d230ac9b0a51311
(cherry picked from commit 2987b33970bc0c04ee70007c1e4d378b6700f301)
""}]",374987,4cfaa7669297c095990a0af14ee60d1098baf366,9535,Gorka Eguileor,Gorka,0,"Have a default OPTIONAL_FIELDS for persistent OVOs

This patch adds an empty default so we can do conditional updates on
persistent OVO instances that don't have optional fields.

Fingerprint type SHA-256: RFC6594 - https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6594
